question: I am a 57 year old women with type 1 diabetes. A growth of 4 cms was found by CT scan an the tail of my pancreas. I am very worried that this may be cancerous. The next step is a laprosocpic biopsy. Can you tell me what this procedure will be like?  Does anyone know what the percentage of these growths is malignant?
title: Cyst? Tumor?  Biopsy?
